sub_title: Site Operations Manager at NTT Global Data Centers EMEA / Owner at Fotopersbureau Groeneveld / AI Trainer
summary:
Datacenter & Clean Room Specialist (Data Center Facilities Manager / Clean Room Facilities Manager) with specialisation on datacenters / computercenters. Broad knowledge of environmental systems like CRAC's (Airconditioning), Power Systems (including Emergency Power (UPS / NSA)), Dataconnectivity, Physical and Data Security. 

Also experienced in Integrated Facility Management (IFM)

NEN Standards Committee Member - 381039 Computerruimtes en Datacenters

High/Low Voltage Certified
Microsoft Certified
ITIL Certified
Prince II Certified
DCDE Certified

A large variety of In-house emergency and first-aid service certifications, from basic level to Operational Head

Systems and Network Administration
Clean Room Operations
Clean Room Management
Clean Room Maintenance

Also available as consultant on datacenter related projects, products and procedures.

profile_positions.description:
Supporting the Dutch Datacenter Association from my current role at NTT Global Data Centers in the NEN standards committee 381039 for data centers.

This committee is, for example, concerned with the EN 50600 | Key Performance Indicators for the data centers.
profile_positions.title: Member of the Dutch Standards Committee "NEN Normcommissie 381039 'Computerruimtes en datacenters'"

profile_positions.description:
NTT/e-shelter's Amsterdam data center has gone live Q1 2019, with an initial capacity of 6MW, and total expected capacity of 40MW. Currently 37MW is already available to our clients. In 2019 we started with one datacenter, in 2020 the second one has been delivered. 

NTT/e-shelter - Home to the Cloud - is the largest data center provider in the DACH region. We operate four data center campuses in the Frankfurt region alone with a total of 65,000m2 and up to 300MW of power capacity. Additional data center locations include Berlin, Munich, Hamburg, Vienna and Zurich.

Further expansion is underway in new markets including London and Madrid.

As a member of the NTT Communications Group of companies, e-shelter provides access to a global network of over 150 data centers. Among e-shelter’s clients are leading cloud service providers, financial services companies, telecoms operators, large enterprises and leading system integrators.

profile_positions.title: Owner / Director

profile_positions.description: NH Hotel Group is a world-leading urban hotel operator and a consolidated multinational player. It operates close to 400 hotels and almost 60,000 rooms in 31 markets across Europe, the Americas and Africa, including top city destinations such as Amsterdam, Barcelona, Berlin, Bogota, Brussels, Buenos Aires, Düsseldorf, Frankfurt, London, Madrid, Mexico City, Milan, Munich, New York, Rome and Vienna.
profile_positions.title: Maintenance & Engineering Director Northern Europe (Benelux)

profile_positions.description:
* Maintain overall facility management services to ensure maintenance of the facilities and grounds, and provision of associated services, is executed in a manner consistent with the Client's global standard processes and professional brand image and compliant with applicable local laws, rules and regulations
* Work collaboratively within the facility management team to deliver integrated facility management services across all business lines.
* Deliver on all financial planning routines within assigned portfolio including the preparation and financial management of property budgets with the Clients' goals and objectives addressed, variances tracked and reported on and all fiduciary duties upheld
* Conduct and/or support the execution of periodic interior and exterior site inspections documenting facility conditions and integrating with additional service lines to ensure functional, comfortable, compliant, energy efficient and attractive facilities.
* Support ongoing cost reduction programs to reduce operating costs while maintaining desired environments
* Ensure minimal preventable incidents that create interruptions to the ongoing operations of the Client and safeguard professional risk mitigation related to facility management services.
* Interface with Landlords ensuring total compliance under any Leases in place, accurate and timely reporting and resolution of critical impact tenant (Client) relations issues together with embracing, as applicable, a tenant management program to support prompt collection of management fees and reimbursements from third party tenants occupying space within Client owned premises
* Engage in a culture of continuous improvement and innovation by leveraging business intelligence, adopting and participating in the development of best practices, new tools, process re-engineering and other ideas that provider service delivery efficiencies 
* Perform additional job duties, as requested
profile_positions.title: (Technical) Facilities Manager

profile_positions.description:
The Facilities Technical Manager is responsible for all of the critical environment areas of the data centre. The Facilities Technical Manager is accountable for supporting the Operations Manager with direct line management of the Facilities Shift Managers, management of the contracted hardware service providers and all critical environments change activity in the data centre. The position is responsible for the line management and co‐ordination of Shift Managers.

The Facilities Technical Manager is the technical data centre expert who ensures the facility is safe and efficient. He is responsible for ensuring compliance with all corporate and local policies and procedures, and ensuring all local statutory requirements are fulfilled.
profile_positions.title: Facilities Technical Manager

profile_positions.description: Digital Realty offers complete data center solutions. This means that we not only guarantee the price and delivery date of your data center, but we also provide you with the support and management tools you need to efficiently and cost effectively operate your data center after you move in. We've designed our products and services to provide you with the capabilities you would demand if you built and operated the facility yourself. We view each of our customers as a long term partner. At Digital Realty the success of your business is our business.

volunteer_experiences.role: Teamleider Evenementenhulp Grand Depart Tour de France
volunteer_experiences.description:
Het aansturen van een team Eerste Hulpverleners, Evenementenhulpverleners en Bikers tijdens de Grand Depart van de Tour de France in Utrecht. Verantwoordelijk voor één van de negen posten welke verdeeld waren over de stad Utrecht.

* Eerste lijns hulpverlening aan bezoekers van het evenement
* Contact onderhouden met de centrale meldkamer
* Contact onderhouden met andere hulpverleningsinstanties, zoals reddingsbrigade, (meldkamer) ambulancediensten
* Overdragen van slachtoffers aan reguliere hulpverlening

volunteer_experiences.role: Bestuurslid afdeling Utrecht / Board member Utrecht department

volunteer_experiences.description:
Het aansturen van een team Eerste Hulpverleners tijdens grote evenementen.

Specifieke taken:
* Eerste lijns hulpverlening aan bezoekers van het evenement
* Contact onderhouden met de centrale meldkamer
* Contact onderhouden met andere hulpverleningsinstanties, zoals Politie, Brandweer en Ambulance
* Overdragen van slachtoffers aan reguliere hulpverlening

De Teamleider Noodhulpteam treedt op bij ongevallen en calamiteiten en coödineert de (hulp)activiteiten in de T3 Verzorglocatie. Hij stemt af met de Officier van Dienst Geneeskundig en de coördinerende zorgprofessional. Hij geeft leiding aan de Noodhulpteamleden rapporteert aan de OvD-G en Piket Rode Kruis.

Het aansturen van een team Eerste Hulpverleners, Evenementenhulpverleners en Bikers tijdens de Internationale ICAN Triathlon in Amsterdam. 

* Eerste lijns hulpverlening aan bezoekers van het evenement
